name: Bat Shirt
description:
We're going bat shirt crazy!

Yellow bats on a black shirt. This is where I'd normally make a joke about the Twins lack of offense so far this year, but Liriano just threw a no-hitter tonight, so I'll cut them some slack.

name: Western Curses / The Dirty Hits split 7"
description: Over the past decade and a half, the members of The Dirty Hits and Western Curses have been in a lot of punk rock bands based out of the Twin Cities; more than I want to list here. Showing that even the noisiest among us can get better with age rather than fade away, the two bands are releasing a split 7 inch together. They share traits that havenâ€™t been given up over the years- they are still loud, energetic, melodic, and, well, probably a bit drunk. And as this record shows, they are now also adept at wailing guitars, thoughtful songwriting, and wonderfully nuanced lyrics.
